channel.title: Abendiix | Games, tools and more!
channel.description: I'm Abendiix and I make games, tools and anything that can change the world, making it a better place for everyone.

item.title: Preview - BOTO LABO
item.description: Check out Boto‚Äôs new movement animation from their design update!

item.title: Extra - BOTO LABO
item.description: Last week BOTO LABO was at BCN GameFest 2025 and it was amazing!! Thanks to everyone that came to the booth to play the game or have a chat! It was a pleasure to meet such incredible and friendly people üå±‚ù§Ô∏è

item.title: Extra - BOTO LABO
item.description: Just one day left for BCN GameFest 2025!! Remember that BOTO LABO will be at EXH 104, just to the right when entering the event!

item.title: Preview - BOTO LABO
item.description: Who doesn't love some stickers? Come by our booth at BCN GameFest 2025 to get some from BOTO LABO! Wait... what's that on the middle of the stickers?

item.title: Preview - BOTO LABO
item.description: BOTO LABO will have new and improved levels to try out at BCN GameFest 2025! Visit our booth and try to beat them all! ü§ñüå±

item.title: Extra - BOTO LABO
item.description: BOTO LABO will be at BCN GameFest 2025 next weekend (10-12th) at La Farga! See you there! üëÄ

item.title: Update - BOTO LABO
item.description: BOTO LABO‚Äôs website and mine have been updated with information about BOTO LABO and its presskit!

item.title: Preview - Social
item.description: It's been some time since Boto's last appearance! Take a look at their new idle animation that will improve their movement across the levels!

item.title: Release - Social
item.description: From now on I will be streaming while I work on my projects!

item.title: Preview - BOTO LABO
item.description: Preparing a small surprise for next week!

item.title: Extra - BOTO LABO
item.description: Huge thanks to @guadalindie for the incredible event! It was an amazing experience and I met a lot of cool people ^^ (A bit late but didn't want to come back from the hiatus without mentioning anything :P)

item.title: Update - Social
item.description: After some hiatus we are back with posting and with a renovated layout for the posts!

item.title: Preview - BOTO LABO

item.title: Preview - BOTO LABO
item.description: Only 6 days left for Guadalindie 2025 and only 6 days left to get one of these spinning keychains!

item.title: Preview - BOTO LABO
item.description: Just a week away from #Guadalindie25 and day 1 of preparing an arcade so you can try BOTO LABO in the most retro style!

item.title: Update - Posts
item.description: Templates updated! They will now take less space and be more quick, improving the quality of every post and the watcher's experience!

item.title: Update - Posts
item.description: Working on new designs for the templates!

item.title: Preview - BOTO LABO
item.description: From zero to hero, complete all the 100 levels you'll find in BOTO LABO!

item.description: What may these buttons do...? Hint: BOTO LABO is a Sokoban game with some twists from the Puzzle genre!

item.title: Preview - BOTO LABO

item.description: It's been a rough week! Remember to rest and take care!

item.title: Preview - Akompi
item.description: Take a look at Akompi, my new project! Akompi is both a virtual pet and companion where you can create and customize any virtual pets and companions that you want. This is Neko having some fun! A classic when it comes to virtual pets.

item.title: Preview - Boto

item.title: 4 symbols
item.description: In this feed, you will find 4 different types of posts. Release posts, preview posts, green posts and extra posts that will cover anything else the previous sections do not cover.
